by_title_keyword.map: function(doc){var tokens;for (var i in doc){if (doc[i].title){tokens = doc[i].title.split(/[^A-Z0-9\-_]+/i);for (var word in tokens){emit(tokens[word], null);}}}}

by_abstract_keyword.map: function(doc){var tokens;for (var i in doc){if (doc[i].abstract){tokens = doc[i].abstract.split(/[^A-Z0-9\-_]+/i);for (var word in tokens){emit(tokens[word], null);}}}}

by_description_keyword.map: function(doc){var tokens;for (var i in doc){if (doc[i].description){tokens = doc[i].description.split(/[^A-Z0-9\-_]+/i);for (var word in tokens){emit(tokens[word], null);}}}}
